hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE5$ tens and $\blueE7$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9748bf4e4670478dc99042e1497ef024494ae522)

There are $\blueE{57}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ tens and $\maroonD{9}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/008f83fcd619820e8ae58c53e66a43544ac11728)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{29}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{57}-\maroonD{29}$, the difference is $\blueE{28}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/684bef6606305e41e7ec610f37fa6bc360bd0b51)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$57 - 29 = 28$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/53db2ec60b950c373d5a6f4847674680156991d1)

[[☃ radio 1]]
